data.name: Tough Elixir
data.description: Grants a X-level toughness effect,  which fortifies your bones to strengthen your defense. Best to use before facing off against hard-hitting enemies.
data.ingredients: Rugged Rhino Beetle

data.name: Spicy Elixir
data.description: Warms your body from its core,  increasing your resistance to cold environments. Very useful in the snow-covered mountains.
data.ingredients: Summerwing Butterfly, Warm Darner

data.name: Sneaky Elixir
data.description: Grants a X-level stealth effect,  which calms the nerves and silences footfalls. Allows you to move about undetected by monsters and animals.
data.ingredients: Sunset Firefly

data.name: Mighty Elixir
data.ingredients: Bladed Rhino Beetle

data.name: Hearty Elixir
data.description: Restores you to full health and increases your maximum hearts. The additional hearts are lost as you take damage.
data.ingredients: Hearty Lizard

data.name: Hasty Elixir
data.description: Grants a X-level haste effect,  which boosts your movement speed while running,  swimming,  or climbing.
data.ingredients: Hightail Lizard, Hot-Footed Frog

data.name: Fireproof Elixir
data.description: Grants a fireproof effect,  which prevents your body from catching fire. Be sure to pack this when venturing out to explore Death Mountain.
data.ingredients: Fireproof Lizard, Smotherwing Butterfly

data.name: Energizing Elixir
data.description: Restores your Stamina,  which is used when performing physical actions such as climbing walls and swimming.
data.ingredients: Restless Cricket, Energetic Rhino Beetle

data.name: Enduring Elixir
data.description: Restores stamina and temporarily extends your Stamina Wheel. The additional stamina will disappear as it's used.
data.ingredients: Tireless Frog

data.name: Electro Elixir
data.description: Grants a X-level resistance to electricity. Useful against enemies with electrical attacks.
data.ingredients: Thunderwing Butterfly, Electric Darner

data.name: Frozen Bass
data.description: That's one cold fish. Eating it won't restore many hearts,  but it will lower your body temperature a bit.
data.ingredients: Hyrule Bass, Staminoka Bass

data.name: Frozen Hearty Bass
data.description: This hearty bass has been frozen by cool air. Eating it will be a challenge because it's frozen solid,  but if you persevere,  it will temporarily increase your heat resistance.
data.ingredients: Hearty Bass

data.name: Frozen Bird Drumstick
data.description: It's as hard as a rock but is supposedly edible. It restores a small number of hearts and has a cooling effect.
data.ingredients: Raw Bird Drumstick

data.name: Frozen Bird Thigh
data.description: High-quality,  frozen bird meat. It's so solid it looks like it could be used as a weapon. Eating it will restore some hearts and cool you down,  but don't break your teeth on it.
data.ingredients: Raw Bird Thigh

data.name: Frozen Whole Bird
data.description: This raw whole bird may have been frozen solid,  but its flavor remains intact. Eating it will provide a temporary boost to your heat resistance.
data.ingredients: Raw Whole Bird

data.name: Frozen Carp
data.description: The crunchy,  icy texture of this chilled carp is quite the delicacy. Eating it will temporarily increase your heat resistance.
data.ingredients: Sanke Carp, Armored Carp

data.name: Frozen Crab
data.description: Doesn't provide as much companionship as an unfrozen crab,  but it won't spoil during your travels. Eat it to gain a temporary boost to your heat resistance.
data.ingredients: Ironshell Crab, Bright-Eyed Crab, Razorclaw Crab

data.name: Frozen River Snail
data.description: The distinct glow of this sneaky river snail has diminished after it's been frozen,  but eating it will provide a temporary increase to your heat resistance.
data.ingredients: Sneaky River Snail

data.name: Frozen Trout
data.description: Being frozen has condensed the taste of fish inside this trout's body. Eating it will provide a temporary boost to your heat resistance.
data.ingredients: Voltfin Trout, Chillfin Trout, Sizzlefin Trout, Stealthfin Trout

data.name: Icy Hearty Blueshell Snail
data.description: It takes a skilled chef to get the meat out of this frozen hearty blueshell snail. Eating this will provide a temporary increase to your heat resistance.
data.ingredients: Hearty Blueshell Snail

data.name: Icy Meat
data.description: A frozen slab of animal meat. If you can manage to chew it up and swallow it,  you'll restore some hearts and lower your body temperature.
data.ingredients: Raw Meat

data.name: Icy Prime Meat
data.description: High-quality,  frozen animal meat. Doesn't restore many hearts,  but it can lower your body temperature.
data.ingredients: Raw Prime Meat

data.name: Icy Gourmet Meat
data.description: This raw gourmet meat has been frozen for easy traveling. It's kept its flavor through the freezing process. Eating it as is will provide a temporary boost to your heat resistance.
data.ingredients: Raw Gourmet Meat

data.name: Chilly Elixir
data.description: Grants a X-level cooling effect,  raising your body's resistance to heat. Crucial for long journeys through the desert.
data.ingredients: Winterwing Butterfly, Cold Darner

data.name: Frozen Hearty Salmon
data.description: This salmon doesn't taste quite as fishy because the excess fat has been removed. It's exceptionally cold,  so eating it provides a temporary boost to heat resistance.
data.ingredients: Hearty Salmon

data.name: Apple Pie
data.description: The crispy,  flaky pie crust and sweet apples are a match made in heaven.
data.ingredients: Tabantha Wheat, Cane Sugar, Goat Butter, Apple

data.name: Carrot Cake
data.description: Even those who don't like carrots tend to enjoy the mild sweetness of this cake.
data.ingredients: Tabantha Wheat, Cane Sugar, Goat Butter, Swift Carrot, Endura Carrot

data.name: Carrot Stew
data.description: This simple stew sat simmering for a long time to bring out the sweetness of the carrots.
data.ingredients: Fresh Milk, Goat Butter, Tabantha Wheat, Swift Carrot, Endura Carrot

data.name: Crab Omelet with Rice
data.description: The fluffy crab legs pair perfectly with the rice for a truly scrumptious dish.
data.ingredients: Hylian Rice, Bird Egg, Rock Salt, Ironshell Crab, Razorclaw Crab, Bright-Eyed Crab

data.name: Crab Risotto
data.description: An everyday stable of seaside villages,  the secret to its delicious flavor lies in crab fat.
data.ingredients: Hylian Rice, Goat Butter, Rock Salt, Ironshell Crab, Razorclaw Crab, Bright-Eyed Crab

data.name: Crab Stir-Fry
data.description: The Goron spice used in preparing this crab pairs perfectly with the flavor of the meat.
data.ingredients: Goron Spice, Ironshell Crab, Razorclaw Crab, Bright-Eyed Crab

data.name: Cream of Mushroom Soup
data.description: The creamy mushroom and vegetable soup is so chunky it eats like a meal!
data.ingredients: Any Mushroom, Any Vegetable, Any Flower or Herb, Fresh Milk, Rock Salt

data.name: Cream of Vegetable Soup
data.description: Made by simmering vegetables in milk,  this healthy dish is as simple as the ingredients.
data.ingredients: Any Vegetable (except Carrot or Pumpkin, Any Flower or Herb, Fresh Milk, Rock Salt

data.name: Creamy Heart Soup
data.description: Enjoying this sweet soup with another person will bring you both closer together.
data.ingredients: Hydromelon, Voltfruit, Fresh Milk, Hearty Radish, Big Hearty Radish

data.name: Creamy Meat Soup
data.description: This nutritious soup contains serious portions of lightly-braised meat and many vegetables.
data.ingredients: Any Meat, Any Vegetable, Any Flower or Herb, Fresh Milk, Rock Salt

data.name: Creamy Seafood Soup
data.description: Thuck-cut chunks of seafood and stock provides a satisfying savoriness.
data.ingredients: Any Seafood, Any Vegetable, Any Flower or Herb, Fresh Milk, Rock Salt

data.name: Curry Pilaf
data.description: The goron spice used in this pilaf has given it a rich,  spicy aroma.
data.ingredients: Hylian Rice, Bird Egg, Goat Butter, Goron Spice

data.name: Curry Rice
data.description: A favorite all over Hyrule,  this simple dish has a flavor you just won't get tired of.
data.ingredients: Hylian Rice, Goron Spice

data.name: Dubious Food
data.description: It's too gross to even look at. A bizarre smell issues forth from this heap. Eating it won't hurt you though...probably.
data.ingredients: Any Monster Part, Wood, Bladed Rhino Beetle, Rugged Rhino Beetle, Energetic Rhino Beetle, Cold Darner, Warm Darner, Electric Darner, Hearty Lizard, Hightail Lizard, Fireproof Lizard, Tireless Frog, Hot-Footed Frog, Restless Cricket, Summerwing Butterfly, Winterwing Butterfly, Smotherwing Butterfly, Thunderwing Butterfly, Sunset Firefly

data.name: Egg Pudding
data.description: Made by cooking eggs and milk in a special mold,  its soft texture melts in your mouth.
data.ingredients: Fresh Milk, Bird Egg, Cane Sugar

data.name: Egg Tart
data.description: You'll know this simple dessert is done baking when it smells just delightful.
data.ingredients: Tabantha Wheat, Bird Egg, Cane Sugar, Goat Butter

data.name: Energizing Glazed Meat
data.description: The sweetness of the honey permeates the meat,  giving it a complex taste profile.
data.ingredients: Courser Bee Honey, Raw Bird Thigh, Raw Bird Drumstick, Raw Gourmet Meat, Raw Meat, Raw Prime Meat, Raw Whole Bird

data.name: Energizing Honey Candy
data.description: A natural sweet,  brimming with nutrition and made by stewing fresh honey.
data.ingredients: Courser Bee Honey

data.name: Energizing Honeyed Apple
data.description: A juicy sweet-and-sour dish combining newly ripened apples with honey.
data.ingredients: Apple, Courser Bee Honey

data.name: Fish Skewer
data.description: A simple dish made by cooking chunks of fresh fish on a skewer.
data.ingredients: Armored Carp, Armored Porgy, Voltfin Trout, Chillfin Trout, Sizzlefin Trout, Stealthfin Trout, Hearty Bass, Hyrule Bass, Staminoka Bass, Hearty Salmon, Sanke Carp, Mighty Carp

data.name: Copious Fish Skewers
data.description: It's just a whole heap of stuff shoved on to a skewer,  but it's still a pretty tasty dish.
data.ingredients: Any 4 different Seafood

data.name: Fish and Mushroom Skewer
data.description: A simple dish made by cooking skewered,  fresh fish alongside fragrant mushrooms.
data.ingredients: Rushroom, Sunshroom, Zapshroom, Ironshroom, Chillshroom, Razorshroom, Endura Shroom, Hylian Shroom, Silent Shroom, Stamella Shroom, Hearty Truffle, Big Hearty Truffle, Voltfin Trout, Chillfin Trout, Sizzlefin Trout, Stealthfin Trout, Sanke Carp, Mighty Carp, Armored Carp, Hearty Bass, Hyrule Bass, Staminoka Bass, Hearty Salmon

data.ingredients: Tabantha Wheat, Goat Butter, Rock Salt, Any Seafood

data.name: Fragrant Mushroom Sauté
data.description: The fragrant aroma of this sautéed spice and mushroom dish makes your mouth water.

data.ingredients: Mighty Bananas, Tabantha Wheat, Cane Sugar

data.name: Fried Egg and Rice
data.description: The soft egg yolk pairs well with the fresh rice in this simple dish.
data.ingredients: Hylian Rice, Bird Egg

data.description: A healthy dish made by cooking mixed greens over a strong flame.
data.ingredients: Any 4 different Vegetables,  Herbs or Flowers

data.ingredients: Apple, Fleet-Lotus Seeds, Hearty Durian, Hydromelon, Mighty Bananas, Palm Fruit, Spicy Pepper, Voltfruit, Wildberry

data.name: Fruit Pie

data.ingredients: Apple, Wildberry, Tabantha Wheat, Cane Sugar, Fleet-Lotus Seeds, Hearty Durian, Hydromelon, Mighty Bananas, Voltfruit, Palm Fruit, Spicy Pepper

data.name: Glazed Mushrooms

data.name: Glazed Seafood

data.ingredients: Courser Bee Honey, Any Seafood

data.name: Gourmet Meat and Rice Bowl

data.description: A marriage of the choicest cuts of meat and seafood. As delicious as it is filling!

data.description: The meat has simmered for so long it melts in your mouth. A true bucket-list meal!

data.description: Made with the highest-quality poultry,  every bite of this pilaf floods your mouth with flavor.

data.ingredients: Tabantha Wheat, Goat Butter, Rock Salt, Raw Bird Thigh, Raw Bird Drumstick, Raw Gourmet Meat, Raw Meat, Raw Prime Meat, Raw Whole Bird

data.name: Meat Skewer

data.ingredients: Hylian Rice, Raw Bird Thigh, Raw Bird Drumstick, Raw Gourmet Meat, Raw Meat, Raw Prime Meat, Raw Whole Bird

data.name: Monster Cake

data.ingredients: Tabantha Wheat, Cane Sugar, Goat Butter, Monster Extract

data.name: Monster Curry

data.name: Monster Stew

data.name: Simmered Fruit
data.description: This sweet dish is made by heaping tasty fruits into a pan and simmering until tender.
data.ingredients: Apple, Fleet-Lotus Seeds, Hearty Durian, Hydromelon, Mighty Bananas, Palm Fruit, Spicy Pepper, Voltfruit, Wildberry

data.name: Copious Simmered Fruit
data.description: The flavors of the various fruits in this simmered dish exist in perfect harmony.
data.ingredients: Apple, Fleet-Lotus Seeds, Hearty Durian, Hydromelon, Mighty Bananas, Palm Fruit, Spicy Pepper, Voltfruit, Wildberry

data.name: Spiced Meat Skewer
data.description: A special Goron spice covers up the scent of the meat,  allowing its flavor to shine.
data.ingredients: Goron Spice, Raw Meat

data.name: Spicy Pepper Steak
data.description: A dish made by cooking meat in crushed peppers,  suppressing the gamy taste while accentuating its flavor.
data.ingredients: Spicy Pepper, Raw Bird Thigh, Raw Bird Drumstick, Raw Gourmet Meat, Raw Meat, Raw Prime Meat, Raw Whole Bird

data.name: Spicy Sautéed Peppers
data.description: The spiciness of these sautéed peppers has been broken by the heat for a sweeter taste.
data.ingredients: Spicy Pepper

data.name: Steamed Fish
data.description: A refined dish made by wrapping a fresh fish in fragrant wild greens and cooking it.
data.ingredients: Any Vegetable, Any Flower or Herb, Any Seafood

data.name: Steamed Fruit
data.description: A regional dish made by steaming near-ripened fruits in the leaves of fragrant plants.
data.ingredients: Any Fruit, Any Vegetable, Any Flower or Herb

data.name: Steamed Meat
data.description: This meat dish has been wrapped in fragrant leaves and steamed to preserve its moisture.
data.ingredients: Any Meat, Any Flower or Herb, Any Vegetable (except Pumpkin

data.name: Steamed Mushrooms
data.description: A healthy vegetable dish achieved by steaming mushrooms in plant leaves.
data.ingredients: Any Mushroom, Any Vegetable, Any Flower or Herb

data.name: Tough Meat-Stuffed Pumpkin
data.description: Grants a low-level defense boost. This hollow,  meat-filled fortified pumpkin is a local specialty or Kakariko Village.
data.ingredients: Fortified Pumpkin, Raw Bird Thigh, Raw Bird Drumstick, Raw Gourmet Meat, Raw Meat, Raw Prime Meat, Raw Whole Bird

data.name: Vegetable Curry
data.description: This healthy curry is popular for its mild flavor and moderate spiciness.
data.ingredients: Hylian Rice, Goron Spice, Swift Carrot, Endura Carrot, Fortified Pumpkin

data.name: Vegetable Omelet
data.description: This home-style dish mixes fluffy eggs with chopped vegetables for nutritional balance.
data.ingredients: Any Vegetable, Any Flower or Herb, Bird Egg, Goat Butter, Rock Salt

data.name: Vegetable Risotto
data.description: The sweetness of the ingredients gives this risotto a mild flavor.
data.ingredients: Hylian Rice, Goat Butter, Rock Salt, Fortified Pumpkin, Swift Carrot, Endura Carrot

data.name: Veggie Cream Soup
data.description: This creamy soup showcases the sweetness of vegetables in a veritable taste explosion.
data.ingredients: Fresh Milk, Rock Salt, Fortified Pumpkin, Swift Carrot, Endura Carrot

data.name: Veggie Rice Balls
data.description: This home-style dish of Kakariko Village is stuffed with the bounty of the mountains.
data.ingredients: Any Vegetable, Any Flower or Herb, Hylian Rice

data.name: Warm Milk
data.description: Make this by heating up some milk. Drink it before bed to ensure a good night's sleep.
data.ingredients: Fresh Milk

data.name: Wheat Bread
data.description: Made with wheat from the Tabantha region,  this soft,  springy bread smells just heavenly.
data.ingredients: Tabantha Wheat, Rock Salt

data.name: Wildberry Crepe
data.description: Sweet,  tart wildberries are folded into thin,  springy dough to make this dessert.
data.ingredients: Wildberry, Fresh Milk, Cane Sugar, Tabantha Wheat, Bird Egg

data.name: Hard-Boiled Egg
data.description: A bird egg boiled using water from naturally occurring hot springs. It's popular among children and is easy to make.
data.ingredients: Bird Egg

data.name: Baked Apple
data.description: Direct heat has softened and sweetened this apple. Eat it to restore three quarters of a heart.
data.ingredients: Apple

data.name: Baked Fortified Pumpkin
data.description: This fortified pumpkin has been roasted whole. The hard rind serves as a container for the steamed pumpkin flesh inside.
data.ingredients: Fortified Pumpkin

data.name: Baked Palm Fruit
data.description: This palm fruit was broiled with direct heat,  resulting in steamed flesh inside the rind. Best served at the moment the juices emerge while roasting.
data.ingredients: Palm Fruit

data.name: Blackened Crab
data.description: A whole crab slow-roasted in its shell. The soft,  flaky flesh pairs nicely with the scent of the charred shell for a meal that assaults all five of your senses in all the best ways.
data.ingredients: Ironshell Crab, Razorclaw Crab, Bright-Eyed Crab

data.name: Blueshell Escargot
data.description: The shell of this hearty blueshell snail acted as a tiny slow cooker as it was roasted. Some people love the trademark bitterness of its tail meat.
data.ingredients: Hearty Blueshell Snail

data.name: Campfire Egg
data.description: Roasting a bird egg whole in its shell like this helps retain water,  making the egg a bit chewier than usual.
data.ingredients: Bird Egg

data.name: Charred Pepper
data.description: A pepper that's been gently caressed by an open flame. It's much less spicy now.
data.ingredients: Spicy Pepper

data.name: Roasted Acorn
data.description: An acorn cooked with direct ehat. Its nutty armoa has been amplified.
data.ingredients: Acorn

data.name: Roasted Armoranth
data.description: Simple,  roasted armoranth. The heat has frayed the hard,  chewy fiber just enough to make it easy to eat.
data.ingredients: Armoranth

data.name: Roasted Bass
data.description: A bass that's been cooked whole over an open flame. It's flaky and savory smelling. Offers more hearts than the raw version.
data.ingredients: Hyrule Bass, Staminoka Bass

data.name: Roasted Hearty Bass
data.description: An open flame has crisped the skin of this hearty bass to perfection. It's a sizable portion and contains just the right amount of fat to create an exceptionally tasty dish.
data.ingredients: Hearty Bass

data.name: Roasted Big Radish
data.description: A roasted big hearty radish. To take such a precious vegetable and put it to the fire is decadent in a way.
data.ingredients: Big Hearty Radish

data.name: Roasted Bird Drumstick
data.description: Raw bird drumstick that's been cooked to a crisp,  skin and all. It's devoid of seasoning,  but it has a simple,  accessible taste. Restores more hearts than the raw variety.
data.ingredients: Raw Bird Drumstick

data.name: Roasted Bird Thigh
data.description: Prime meat that's been flame-seared to perfection. The outide is crispy,  but the inside is juicy. Eat it to recover hearts.
data.ingredients: Raw Bird Thigh

data.name: Roasted Carp
data.description: Roasting this freshwater carp helped to supress some of its stench,  making it easier to stomach. You can really sink your teeth into the thick,  meaty flesh.
data.ingredients: Sanke Carp, Mighty Carp, Armored Carp

data.name: Roasted Hearty Durian
data.description: This hearty durian was roasted whole inside its hard shell. Unfortunately,  roasting it did nothing to remove its distinct odor. Eat it to recover a lot of hearts.
data.ingredients: Hearty Durian

data.name: Roasted Endura Carrot
data.description: This flame-kissed endura carrot makes for a truly extravagant single-item dish. The fire really brought out its sweetness.
data.ingredients: Endura Carrot

data.name: Roasted Hydromelon
data.description: This hydromelon was roasted whole for a very soft and flaky inner flesh with a rather intriguing flavor. Now this is your money melon!
data.ingredients: Hydromelon

data.name: Roasted Lotus Seeds
data.description: Flame-roasted fleet-lotus seeds. Peel the skin back to get to the soft and flaky center.
data.ingredients: Fleet-Lotus Seeds

data.name: Roasted Mighty Bananas
data.description: These mighty bananas have been roasted whole. Cooking them through has turned the fruit into a sticky,  rich,  aromatic syrup.
data.ingredients: Mighty Bananas

data.name: Roasted Mighty Thistle
data.description: Lightly toasted mighty thistle. It has no special effects,  but now that it's been grilled,  the pointy ends go down smooth.
data.ingredients: Mighty Thistle

data.name: Roasted Porgy
data.description: The soft and fluffy texture of this seafaring fish has been enhanced by roasting it over an open fire. The crisp,  aromatic skin is particularly delicious.
data.ingredients: Mighty Porgy, Armored Porgy

data.name: Roasted Radish
data.description: A roasted hearty radish. Fragrant and warm,  it has no special effect but will restore hearts.
data.ingredients: Hearty Radish

data.name: Roasted Hearty Salmon
data.ingredients: Hearty Salmon

data.name: Roasted Swift Carrot
data.description: A fragrant swift carrot that's been lightly roasted. It doesn't have any special effects,  but it will restore some health.
data.ingredients: Swift Carrot

data.name: Roasted Tree Nut
data.description: A tree seed roasted to amplify its fragrance. Gives more hearts that the raw variety.
data.ingredients: Chickaloo Tree Nut

data.name: Roasted Trout
data.description: This trout can be found all over Hyrule. Served river-to-table,  it's simply cooked for a soft and flaky flesh with a mild flavor.
data.ingredients: Voltfin Trout, Chillfin Trout, Sizzlefin Trout, Stealthfin Trout

data.name: Roasted Voltfruit
data.description: This voltfruit from the Gerudo Desert has been charred to really bring out its sweet and sour flavors.
data.ingredients: Voltfruit

data.name: Roasted Wildberry
data.description: This wildberry was prepared over an open flame to alter its sweet taste. It recovers more health than if eaten raw.
data.ingredients: Wildberry

data.name: Roasted Whole Bird
data.description: This raw whole bird has been tickled by an open flame to bring out its flavor. Less is more,  as the lack of additional seasoning allows its natural taste to shine.
data.ingredients: Raw Whole Bird

data.name: Seared Gourmet Steak
data.description: The highest quality raw gourmet meat,  just kissed by an open flame. No additional seasonings have been added,  which lets the natural flavor of the meat really shine.
data.ingredients: Raw Gourmet Meat

data.name: Seared Prime Steak
data.description: Raw prime meat cooked over an open flame. The outside is perfectly browned,  while the inside is mouthwateringly juicy.
data.ingredients: Raw Prime Meat

data.name: Seared Steak
data.description: Raw meat cooked over an open flame. Cooking it has increased its flavor and the number of hearts it provides.
data.ingredients: Raw Meat

data.name: Sneaky River Escargot
data.description: Sneaky river snail roasted whole in its shell. The meat is soft and a little chewy. Pulling all the meat from the shell in one go fills you with a sense of accomplishment.
data.ingredients: Sneaky River Snail

data.name: Toasty Chillshroom
data.description: A fully roasted chillshroom. It's evenly toasted and tastes a low better than when eaten raw. Eating it will restore a bit of health.
data.ingredients: Chillshroom

data.name: Toasty Endura Shroom
data.description: A toasted endura shroom. It doesn't grant any special effects,  but boy is it tasty!
data.ingredients: Endura Shroom

data.name: Toasted Hearty Truffle
data.description: A hearty truffle with a toasted,  crispy outside and warm,  gooey inside.
data.ingredients: Hearty Truffle

data.name: Toasted Big Hearty Truffle
data.description: This big hearty truffle has been roasted whole. It gets full points for aroma and nutrition. Eat it to recover a lot of hearts.
data.ingredients: Big Hearty Truffle

data.name: Toasty Ironshroom
data.description: An ironshroom exposed to an open flame. Its once-tough exterior is now crunchy and tasty. Restores a bit of health.
data.ingredients: Ironshroom

data.name: Toasty Hylian Shroom
data.description: A Hylian Shroom toasted to perfection. The taste and fragrance are amplified,  restoring more health to its consumer.
data.ingredients: Hylian Shroom

data.name: Toasty Razorshroom
data.description: A razorshroom that's been exposed to direct heat. Its sharp exterior has softened considerably. Restores a bit of health.
data.ingredients: Razorshroom

data.name: Toasty Rushroom
data.description: A rushroom that's been put to the torch. It may have lost its speedy properties,  but at least it tastes good now.
data.ingredients: Rushroom

data.name: Toasty Silent Shroom
data.description: A whole,  toasted silent shroom. High heat may have destroyed its soft glow,  but it's now fragrant and taasty.
data.ingredients: Silent Shroom

data.name: Toasty Stamella Shroom
data.description: This toasted Stamella Shroom doesn't grant any special effects,  but it will restore one and a half hearts.
data.ingredients: Stamella Shroom

data.name: Toasty Sunshroom
data.description: It's always a good idea to keep a fully roasted sunshroom or two on hand just in case. Eat it to recover a bit of health.
data.ingredients: Sunshroom

data.name: Toasty Zapshroom
data.description: It's not very shocking that this fully roasted zapshroom is delicious. Eat it to recover a bit of health.
data.ingredients: Zapshroom

data.name: Fairy Tonic
data.description: This powerful recovery elixir harnesses the power of fairies. It has a sweet fragrance.
data.ingredients: Fairy
